程序包 org.cloudbus.cloudsim

类 DatacenterCharacteristics

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.DatacenterCharacteristics
public class DatacenterCharacteristics
extends java.lang.Object
Represents static properties of a resource such as architecture, Operating System (OS), management policy (time- or space-shared), cost and time zone at which the resource is located along resource configuration.
从以下版本开始:
CloudSim Toolkit 1.0

  • 字段概要

    字段 
    修饰符和类型 字段 说明
    static int ADVANCE_RESERVATION
    A resource that supports Advanced Reservation mechanisms.
    static int OTHER_POLICY_DIFFERENT_RATING
    Assuming all PEs in a PM have the same rating.
    static int OTHER_POLICY_SAME_RATING
    Assuming all PEs in all PMs have the same rating.
    static int SPACE_SHARED
    Spaced-shared CPU allocation policy using First Come First Serve (FCFS) algorithm.
    static int TIME_SHARED
    Time-shared CPU allocation policy using Round-Robin algorithm.

  • 构造器概要

    构造器 
    构造器 说明

    Creates a new DatacenterCharacteristics object.

  • 字段详细资料

    • TIME_SHARED

      public static final int TIME_SHARED
      Time-shared CPU allocation policy using Round-Robin algorithm.
      另请参阅:
      常量字段值

    • SPACE_SHARED

      public static final int SPACE_SHARED
      Spaced-shared CPU allocation policy using First Come First Serve (FCFS) algorithm.
      另请参阅:
      常量字段值

    • OTHER_POLICY_SAME_RATING

      public static final int OTHER_POLICY_SAME_RATING
      Assuming all PEs in all PMs have the same rating.
      另请参阅:
      常量字段值

    • OTHER_POLICY_DIFFERENT_RATING

      public static final int OTHER_POLICY_DIFFERENT_RATING
      Assuming all PEs in a PM have the same rating. However, each PM has different rating to each other.
      另请参阅:
      常量字段值

    • ADVANCE_RESERVATION

      public static final int ADVANCE_RESERVATION
      A resource that supports Advanced Reservation mechanisms.
      另请参阅:
      常量字段值

  • 构造器详细资料

    • DatacenterCharacteristics

      public DatacenterCharacteristics​(java.lang.String architecture, java.lang.String os, java.lang.String vmm, java.util.List<? extends Host> hostList, double timeZone, double costPerSec, double costPerMem, double costPerStorage, double costPerBw)
      Creates a new DatacenterCharacteristics object. If the time zone is invalid, then by default, it will be GMT+0.
      参数:
      architecture - the architecture of the datacenter
      os - the operating system used on the datacenter's PMs
      vmm - the virtual machine monitor used
      hostList - list of machines in the datacenter
      timeZone - local time zone of a user that owns this reservation. Time zone should be of range [GMT-12 ... GMT+13]
      costPerSec - the cost per sec of CPU use in the datacenter
      costPerMem - the cost to use memory in the datacenter
      costPerStorage - the cost to use storage in the datacenter
      costPerBw - the cost of each byte of bandwidth (bw) consumed

  • 方法详细资料

    • getResourceName

      public java.lang.String getResourceName()
      Gets the name of a resource.
      返回:
      the resource name

    • getHostWithFreePe

      public Host getHostWithFreePe()
      Gets the first PM with at least one empty Pe.
      返回:
      a Machine object or if not found

    • getHostWithFreePe

      public Host getHostWithFreePe​(int peNumber)
      Gets a Machine with at least a given number of free Pe.
      参数:
      peNumber - the pe number
      返回:
      a Machine object or if not found

    • getMipsOfOnePe

      public int getMipsOfOnePe()
      Gets the Million Instructions Per Second (MIPS) Rating of the first Processing Element (Pe) of the first PM. NOTE:It is assumed all PEs' rating is same in a given machine.
      返回:
      the MIPS Rating or -1 if no PEs exists

    • getMipsOfOnePe

      public int getMipsOfOnePe​(int id, int peId)
      Gets Millions Instructions Per Second (MIPS) Rating of a Processing Element (Pe). It is essential to use this method when a datacenter is made up of heterogenous PEs per PMs.
      参数:
      id - the machine ID
      peId - the Pe ID
      返回:
      the MIPS Rating or -1 if no PEs are exists.

    • getMips

      public int getMips()
      Gets the total MIPS rating, which is the sum of MIPS rating of all PMs in a datacenter.

      Total MIPS rating for:

      • TimeShared = 1 Rating of a Pe * Total number of PEs
      • Other policy same rating = same as TimeShared
      • SpaceShared = Sum of all PEs in all Machines
      • Other policy different rating = same as SpaceShared
      • Advance Reservation = 0 or unknown. You need to calculate this manually.
      返回:
      the sum of MIPS ratings

    • getCpuTime

      public double getCpuTime​(double cloudletLength, double load)
      Gets the amount of CPU time (in seconds) that the cloudlet will spend to finish processing, considering the current CPU allocation policy (currently only for TIME_SHARED) and cloudlet load.
      参数:
      cloudletLength - the length of a Cloudlet
      load - the current load of a Cloudlet (percentage of load from 0 to 1)
      返回:
      the CPU time (in seconds)

    • getNumberOfPes

      public int getNumberOfPes()
      Gets the total number of PEs for all PMs.
      返回:
      number of PEs

    • getNumberOfFreePes

      public int getNumberOfFreePes()
      Gets the total number of FREE or non-busy PEs for all PMs.
      返回:
      number of PEs

    • getNumberOfBusyPes

      public int getNumberOfBusyPes()
      Gets the total number of BUSY PEs for all PMs.
      返回:
      number of PEs

    • setPeStatus

      public boolean setPeStatus​(int status, int hostId, int peId)
      Sets the particular Pe status on a PM.
      参数:
      status - Pe status, either Pe.FREE or Pe.BUSY
      hostId - Machine ID
      peId - Pe id
      返回:
      otherwise (Machine id or Pe id might not be exist)

    • getCostPerMi

      public double getCostPerMi()
      Gets the cost per Million Instruction (MI) associated with a Datacenter.
      返回:
      the cost using CPU of PM in the Datacenter

    • getNumberOfHosts

      public int getNumberOfHosts()
      Gets the total number of PMs.
      返回:
      total number of machines the Datacenter has.

    • getNumberOfFailedHosts

      public int getNumberOfFailedHosts()
      Gets the current number of failed PMs.
      返回:
      current number of failed PMs the Datacenter has.

    • isWorking

      public boolean isWorking()
      Checks whether all PMs of the datacenter are working properly or not.
      返回:
      if all PMs are working, otherwise
